description:
Make your own story. User-friendly software for LLM roleplaying

RisuAI, or Risu for short, is a cross platform AI chatting software / web application with powerful features such as multiple API support, assets in the chat, regex functions and much more.
- feat: Traditional Chinese translation update
- fix: fetchNative and globalFetch properly support plugin
- fix: prevent TDZ crash in sendChat error inlay (HypaV3 early failure)
- fix: Restore inlay explorer languages
- fix: Ignore audio.play() error when it is in fire-and-forget
- ref: Separate common functions out of requests.ts
- ref: Move parser.svelte under parser
- ref: fix typos in PR template
- feat: Prevent importing a HypaV3 preset as a module
- feat: Add accessibility option to move hamburger menu button
- feat: support claude adaptive thinking
- feat: Plugin V3 api for getting translation cache
- feat: add settings item type SegmentControl
- feat: add Claude Sonnet 4.6
- feat: add Gemini 3.1
- feat: add dynamic model registry
- feat: add replacer API for plugin v3
- feat: proxy AbortSignal across iframe boundary for V3 plugin provider callbacks
